title: Bug 17703 - Inconsistent Dialog for 'Add Task' Action
description: The 'Add Task' action should use the Workbench dialog, as the Java Editor does.
OB: When selecting a Compilation Unit (CU) in the packages view and executing the 'File > Add Task' action, a different dialog appears compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'Add Task' action consistently uses the Workbench dialog, similar to how it behaves in the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Select a Compilation Unit (CU) in the packages view.
2) Execute 'File > Add Task'.
Observation: The dialog that appears is different from the one shown when executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
